title: AI Algorithms Transform Desalination Systems Through Performance Prediction and Optimization
summary: This comprehensive review examines how artificial intelligence algorithms are being applied to optimize desalination processes and predict system performance in response to global water scarcity challenges. The study covers AI applications across standalone, hybrid, and renewable energy-integrated desalination systems, highlighting AI's advantages over traditional mathematical modeling, particularly in computational efficiency.
bulletPoints: AI algorithms are used for three main applications in desalination: performance prediction using historical data, system parameter optimization, and process control
The review covers AI implementation across multiple desalination configurations including standalone systems, hybrid systems, renewable energy desalination, and poly/multi-generation systems
AI modeling offers significant advantages over traditional mathematical modeling, primarily due to lower computational requirements
Key AI technologies discussed include Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) and Genetic Algorithms for desalination process optimization
The study identifies current gaps in literature and predicts expanding impact of AI in desalination process modeling due to its computational efficiency advantages
